mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.content, c.create_time, c.start, c.state, c.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_img FROM tb_movie_comment c, tb_user u WHERE c.state=0 AND c.movie_id=#{movieId} AND c.user_id=u.user_id ORDER BY c.create_time DESC

SELECT c.comment_id, c.content, c.create_time, c.start, c.state, c.user_id, c.movie_id, m.movie_name, m.movie_img FROM tb_movie_comment c, tb_movie m WHERE c.state=0 AND c.user_id=#{userId} AND c.movie_id=m.movie_id ORDER BY c.create_time DESC
